page.title: Weapon Barrels
page.text: Weapon Barrels are Upgrades for the Tools/Weapons. They can applied at the weapon in the Weapon Station

page.title: Dilithium Focusing Matrix
page.text: It buff the Weapon damage but let the weapon earlier overheat and take more energy for every shot. It can be applied on every weapon except of the Omni Tool.

page.title: Incendiary Filter
page.text: It decrease the Wepon damage but let the target burn. It can be applied on every Weapon except of the Omni Tool.

page.title: Burst Inductive Drum
page.text: It buff the fire rate so your weapon will faster shoot but it overheat after a second. It can be applied on every Weapon except of the Omni Tool.

page.title: Regenerative Converter
page.text: It heals the player when the target get damage from the weapon. Can only applied on the Phaser.

page.title: Degenerative Explosive Focusing Matrix (Doomsday)
page.text: It buff the fire rate so your weapon will shoot faster but it overheat after a second. On the Phaser it will deal splashdamage on the targeted block. It can be applied on every Weapon except of the Omni Tool.

page.title: Voxel Exaggerating Nullification Obliteration Matrix (Venom)
page.text: can be applied on every weapon but only make sense on the Omni Tool because it let the Omni Tool break blocks much faster.
